title: Textile, 1750–99
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave patterned by floats of a set of supplementary warps
dimensions:
a) Warp x Weft: 103 x 54 cm (40 9/16 x 21 1/4 in.)
b) Warp x Weft: 103 x 54 cm (40 9/16 x 21 1/4 in.)
Repeat H: 5.5 cm (2 3/16 in.)
description: Small scale leaf and flower motif which repeat to create vertical curves.  Length of repeat: 5.5 cm. [2-1/8"].  Ten repeats across width of fabric.  Length of fabric placed side-by-side continue pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1750–99. Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave patterned by floats of a set of supplementary warps. 1974-79-4-a,b.
